description: Pay gold to equip with $1 shurikens for next wave only. Each shuriken deals $2 bonus damage from range and attacks $3x as fast. Ability damage.
name: Shuriken Cyclone
tooltip: Pay gold to equip with 3 shurikens for next wave only. Each shuriken deals 35 bonus damage from range and attacks 1.85x as fast. Ability damage.
